title: How to Cheat on Pokémon Glazed

steps.title: Walk through walls.
steps.content: Walk through walls. Enter the following code to be able to walk through solid objects. You'll still only be able to move to different screens if you exit the screen in the correct location: [1] X Research source 7881A409 E2026E0C C56CFACA DC167904

steps.title: Get unlimited Master Balls.
steps.content: Get unlimited Master Balls . Enter this code to get the maximum number of Master Balls for free. After entering this code, you'll find the Master Ball in the first space of your PC storage. [2] X Research source 128898B6 EDA43037

steps.title: Get unlimited Rare Candy.
steps.content: Get unlimited Rare Candy. This code will give you the maximum number of Rare Candy, which will level up your Pokémon. They will appear in the first space of your PC storage. [3] X Research source BFF956FA 2F9EC50D

steps.title: Get unlimited Trade Stones.
steps.content: Get unlimited Trade Stones. These items are unique to Glazed Pokémon, and allow you to evolve Pokémon that normally require trading. When this code is enabled, you'll be able to purchase them for free from any Poké Mart. It will replace the first item for sale and won't cost anything: [4] X Research source 82005274 0066

steps.title: Get infinite money.
steps.content: Get infinite money. This code allows you to get the maximum amount of money. When you enable it, you'll need to sell any item from your bag at a Poké Mart. The item won't actually be sold, and you'll receive 999999 cash: 83005E18 270F

steps.title: Encounter any wild Pokémon you want.
steps.content: Encounter any wild Pokémon you want. When you enable this code, the next wild Pokémon you meet will be the one you specify. This code requires the master code enabled as well as the individual Pokémon code. These should be entered separately. This code only works once per load, so you'll need to disable and re-enable it or enter a different Pokémon for it to work again: [5] X Research source Master Code 00006FA7 000A 1006AF88 0007 Pokémon Code 83007CF6 **** Replace **** with: 0001 - steps.title: Look up Pokémon Emerald codes for more codes to use.
steps.content: Look up Pokémon Emerald codes for more codes to use. Since Glazed Pokémon is built on Pokémon Emerald, most codes should work. Be careful, as some codes may not work properly due to the ROM already being hacked. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Launch VBA-M and load the Pokémon Glazed ROM.
steps.content: Launch VBA-M and load the Pokémon Glazed ROM. The game will need to be running in order to enter cheats for it. The process for entering codes varies slightly if you're using a different emulator, but the codes are the same for all emulators. VBA-M is a popular GBA emulator that you can use to load ROM files. ROM files are copies of the game file, and Pokémon Glazed in a hacked version of the Pokémon Emerald ROM.

steps.title: Click the Tools menu and select "Cheats" → "Enable Cheats."
steps.content: Click the Tools menu and select "Cheats" → "Enable Cheats." This will turn cheats on for the emulator.

steps.title: Click the Options menu and select "Game Boy Advance" → "Real time clock."
steps.content: Click the Options menu and select "Game Boy Advance" → "Real time clock." This feature is required in order for some codes to work.

steps.title: Open the Cheats menu again and select "Cheat list."
steps.content: Open the Cheats menu again and select "Cheat list." This will open a new window.

steps.title: Click the "Add new cheat" button.
steps.content: Click the "Add new cheat" button. It looks like a green bookmark.

steps.title: Enter a description for the code.
steps.content: Enter a description for the code. This is so that you can recognize it. The description has no bearing on if the code works.

steps.title: Select the type of cheat you're using.
steps.content: Select the type of cheat you're using. Most of the cheat codes listed above are "GameShark Advance" codes, unless otherwise specified. Some emulators will auto-detect the type of cheat, but VBA-M users will need to select GameShark Advance from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Paste the code into the "Codes" field.
steps.content: Paste the code into the "Codes" field. Make sure that you are only adding the code for a single cheat at a time. Click "OK" once you've pasted the code. You can find a list of codes lower in this article. If the code was multiple lines, you'll see multiple entries on your code list.

steps.title: Try to use only a single cheat at a time.
steps.content: Try to use only a single cheat at a time. Unless specified otherwise (some cheats require a master code enabled as well), you should only run a single cheat at once. Using more than one at once increases the chances that you'll break the game.

steps.title: Click "OK" to close the Cheat List.
steps.content: Click "OK" to close the Cheat List. You'll be returned to the game and it will unpause.

steps.title: Use your cheats.
steps.content: Use your cheats. Once the game is unpaused your your cheats are enabled, you can use them immediately. For example, if you have the Walk Through Walls cheat enabled, you'll immediately be able to pass through normally blocked objects like trees and gates. If you enabled the Unlimited Master Ball cheat, you'll find them in your PC.

steps.title: Load your Pokémon Glazed ROM in My Boy!
steps.content: Load your Pokémon Glazed ROM in My Boy! This is the most popular emulator for Android devices. If you're using a different emulator, the same codes will work but the process will likely be a little different.

steps.title: Tap the ☰ button.
steps.content: Tap the ☰ button. You'll find this at the top of the controls in the center.

steps.title: Select "Cheats" from the menu.
steps.content: Select "Cheats" from the menu. This will open the Cheats screen.

steps.title: Tap the "+" button in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the "+" button in the upper-right corner. This will allow you to enter a new cheat.

steps.title: Give the cheat a name.
steps.content: Give the cheat a name. This will help you identify it later. The name does not have an impact on the cheat itself.

steps.title: Tap "Cheat code" and paste the code.
steps.content: Tap "Cheat code" and paste the code. My Boy! will automatically detect what type of cheat code it is. You'll find a list of codes at the bottom of this article. My Boy! already has the real time clock enabled, so you don't need to manually turn it on.

steps.title: Tap the ⋮ button and select "Save."
steps.content: Tap the ⋮ button and select "Save." This will save and apply the cheat.

steps.title: Only use one cheat at a time (unless necessary).
steps.content: Only use one cheat at a time (unless necessary). To help reduce crashes, try to stick to one cheat at a time. Adding multiple codes will allow you to switch between them. If you don't need any cheats at the moment, disable any active cheats. Some cheats require a master code as well as the cheat code.

steps.title: Try out your new cheat.
steps.content: Try out your new cheat. After entering the cheat and returning to the game, you should see your cheat code take effect immediately. The process for using the code will vary depending on the code. For example, if you're using the Unlimited Trade Stones cheat, you'll be able to purchase them for free from any Poké Mart. The Trade Stone will replace the first item the store offers. The cheat code list above describes any special conditions you need to meet to use a cheat.
